findings.details: Daily news posts rely on long ordered lists that blend into dense paragraphs on mobile; list items need stronger visual grouping.
Manual scan only; no automated link checker available in this repository.
Site-level metadata and per-page descriptions are present; no changes required for this pass.
News digests benefit from stronger typographic hierarchy and link emphasis to reduce scanning effort.

recommendations: Add dedicated styling for news post ordered lists to improve mobile scannability
Apply an editorial card treatment to news entries for clearer visual grouping
